headline: Align Technology Connects With Over 2,000 Doctors and Practice Staff at the 2025 Invisalign® Asia Pacific (APAC) Summit
summary: BANGKOK, June 27, 2025--Align Technology, Inc. ("Align") (Nasdaq: ALGN), a leading global medical device company that designs, manufactures, and sells the Invisalign® System of clear aligners, iTero™ intraoral scanners, and exocad™ CAD/CAM software for digital orthodontics and restorative dentistry, today shared highlights from the 2025 Invisalign® Asia Pacific ("APAC") Summit held in Bangkok, Thailand, June 5 – 7, 2025.

headline: Reasons to Add Align Technology Stock to Your Portfolio Now
summary: ALGN's Invisalign growth, iTero innovation and solid finances fuel optimism despite forex headwinds.
